meanings.sent1: The candies were flowing galores at the party.
meanings.sent2: She bought candies galores for the children.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled out candies galores from his hat!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed galores in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The stars twinkled galores in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A large amount or number of something.
meanings.sent1: There were galores of candies on the table.
meanings.sent2: He had galores of books in his library.
meanings.sent3: The treasure chest was filled with gold coins galores!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room with happiness galores.
meanings.sent5: The garden bloomed with flowers galores in the spring.
